sentences.en: Chris was looking spruce in his stiff-collared black shirt and new short hair cut.
sentences.cn: 克里斯穿着硬领黑衫，新理了短发，看起来整洁帅气。

sentences.en: Early settlers built frames of spruce, maple and pine.
sentences.cn: 早期的定居者用云杉木、枫木和松木建造屋架。

sentences.en: Following in his steps, I passed through damp spruce woods to an open cliff.
sentences.cn: 我跟在他的后面, 穿过一片潮湿的云杉树林,来到一片开阔的峭壁前.

sentences.en: He looked spruce in his best clothes.
sentences.cn: 他穿了最漂亮的衣裳,看来很神气.

sentences.en: It was made of soft lumber, spruce by the look of it.
sentences.cn: 其制作材料是软木，看起来像是云杉。

sentences.en: Mother told us to spruce the parlor for Christmas.
sentences.cn: 妈妈要我们把客厅收拾整洁过圣诞节.

sentences.en: Mr Bailey was looking very spruce in a white linen suit.
sentences.cn: 贝利先生穿着白色亚麻套装，看上去很整洁。

sentences.en: Spruce yourself up a fit - you look a mess.
sentences.cn: 把你自己打扮得整洁漂亮一点,你的样子很邋遢.

sentences.en: The finely twined baskets are made with young, pliable spruce roots.
sentences.cn: 这些编织精美的篮子是用柔韧的云杉嫩树根编成的。

sentences.en: The growth of spruce and fir needles is determinate.
sentences.cn: 云杉和冷杉的针叶生长是有限的.

sentences.en: The mast, which was a solid spruce spar, bent like a bow, and for a moment I thought we were going to lose it.
sentences.cn: 坚固的云杉木做成的桅杆已经弯得像一把弓，那一刻我觉得它马上就要断了。

sentences.en: The orchard is surrounded by spruce forest.
sentences.cn: 该种子园四周有云杉林环绕.

sentences.en: The pine, cedar and spruce are evergreens.
sentences.cn: 松树 、 雪松、云杉都是常绿的树.

sentences.en: Trees such as spruce, pine and oak have been planted.
sentences.cn: 种植了云杉、松树和橡树等树木。

sentences.en: Trees such as spruce, pine, and oak have been planted.
sentences.cn: 像云杉、松树和橡树之类的树已经种了。

sentences.en: You really must spruce up a bit, Albert.
sentences.cn: 阿尔培,你可是得把自己搞得整洁一点了.

phrases.tran_cn: [植物]西加云杉；[植物]阿拉斯加云杉

trans.tran_cn: 针枞，云杉，云杉木，灰绿色或墨绿色
trans.tran_en: a tree that grows in nor-thern countries and has short leaves shaped like needles
